Pattern IDXSS_MUT_012
NameMathML img onerror XSS
CategoryXSS
Subcategorymutation_xss
SeverityHIGH

Attack Details

  • Payload: <math><mtext><img src=x onerror=alert(1)>
  • Encoded: %3Cmath%3E%3Cmtext%3E%3Cimg%20src%3Dx%20onerror%3Dalert%281%29%3E
